metadata.title: CVE-2022-48767 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ceph: properly put ceph_string reference after async create attemptThe reference acquired by try_prep_async_create is currently leaked.Ensure we put it.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
